channel.title: Dynamics 365 Finance & Operation on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform
channel.description: Recent content in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operation on Dynamics 365 Finance Operations & Power Platform

item.title: Deploy SSRS reports in Dynamics 365 Finance, SCM using Powershell
item.description: Open Windows PowerShell in Admin mode Navigate to the PowerShell scripts cd K:\AosService\PackagesLocalDirectory\Plugins\AxReportVmRoleStartupTask\ Execute the below commands: For deploying all SSRS reports ./DeployAllReportsToSSRS.ps1 -PackageInstallLocation “K:\AosService\PackagesLocalDirectory” For deploying the specific reports ./DeployAllReportsToSSRS.ps1 -Module ApplicationSuite -ReportName <ReportName> -PackageInstallLocation “K:\AosService\PackagesLocalDirectory” Example: ./DeployAllReportsToSsrs.ps1 -Module MaxCustomization -ReportName MaxCheque_US.Report -PackageInstallLocation "K:\AosService\PackagesLocalDirectory" ./DeployAllReportsToSsrs.ps1 -Module ApplicatoinSuite -ReportName Cust* -PackageInstallLocation "C:\AosService\PackagesLocalDirectory"
